segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight is streaming through the window, making everything look so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, it’s a completely different story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out of the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much of a mess this is becoming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice before the water ruins the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the outside and inside is almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I know it’s not going to end well for anyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
